goals.active: Stop the bandits from destroying Vanguard hospital.
goals.complete: Captain Thackeray and I arrived at the hospital just as arsonists were setting it on fire. We fought the bandits and saved the injured patients, but were too late to rescue the orphanage as well. By the time the Ministry Guard arrived, everything was over. Commander Serentine always seems to show up just a little too late to catch these bandits. It's suspiciously convenient.
